綪字的基本解释

綪
qiàn
一种赤色的丝织品。
青赤色。
古书上说的一种染草。

綪
qīng
浅碧色。

綪
zhēng
屈曲。

綪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiàn］
［《廣韻》倉甸切，去霰，清。］
草名。可以染红。引申为大红色。参见“綪茷”。一说，綪为红色缯。《说文·糸部》：“綪，赤繒也。”
[②]［zhēng］
［《廣韻》側莖切，平耕，莊。］
通“1”。
屈曲。

綪字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綪； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页927第08
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?倉甸切，音蒨。【說文】綪，赤繒也。以茜染，故謂之綪。【廣韻】靑赤色。【左傳·定四年】以大路少帛綪茷旃旌。【註】綪茷，大赤，取染草名也。　又【集韻】倉經切，音靑。淺碧色。　又【廣韻】側莖切【集韻】甾莖切，?音爭。䋫或作綪。【儀禮·士喪禮】陳襲事於房中，西領南上不綪。【註】綪讀爲䋫，屈也。江沔之閒謂縈收繩索爲䋫。【禮·玉藻】齊則綪結佩而爵韠。【註】綪，屈也，結又屈之。【史記·楚世家】綪繳蘭臺。【註】縈也。

考證：〔【儀禮】陳襲事於房中，而領南上不綪。〕　謹照原文而領改西領。

綪字的起名意思

青赤色，浅碧色。一种赤色的丝织品。古书上说的一种染草。

綪
Basic explanation of words
綪
qiàn
A red silk fabric.
Cyan red.
A kind of grass dyed in ancient books.
綪
qīng
Light blue.
綪
zhēng

綪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiàn］
["Guangyun" Cangdian cut, go to hail, clear. ]
Cursive name. Can be dyed red. The extension is big red. See "綪茷". One said, the 綪 is red. "Shuowen·Shibu": "Chu, Chi Fu also."
[②]［zhēng］
["Guangyun" side stems are cut, flat plowing, Zhuang. ]
Pass "1".
Buckling.
綪

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　綪; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 927 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cangdian cut, Yinqian. [Said the text] Chi, Chi Chi also. With Qianran, it is called Zhiqi. [Guang Yun] Red color. [Zuo Zhuan·Ding Four Years] Yi Dalu Shaobo Qiqiangjing. [Note] Weifu, Dachi, take the name of the dyed grass.　[Jiyun] Cangjing cut, sound 靑. Light blue.　[Guangyun] Lateral stem cut [Jiyun] Stem cut, sound contention. Wait or make a mess. [Rituals and Funerals] Chen Xi was in the room, and the western leader was not going to the south. [Note] Qi is pronounced as 䋫, Qu also. Jiang Mianzhi said that lingering on the ropes means lingering. 【Rite·Yuzao】Qi Zeqi is knotted and majestic. [Note] Qi, bend also, knot and bend again. 【Historical Records·Chu Family】Chu Pai Lantai. [Note] Ying Ye. 綪
Name meaning
Cyan red, light bicolor. A red silk fabric. A kind of grass dyed in ancient books.
qiàn, zhēng
I qiàn сущ.
* красная шёлковая ткань; красный шёлк
II zhēng прил.
* кривой, искривлённый
